name: amqp-messaging
description: connection manager and messaging packing and serialization for microservices using rabbitmq

scripts.test: npm run eslint:test --exit && NODE_ENV='test' node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test-report: npm run eslint:test && NODE_ENV='test' node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js report -r html node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/**/*.spec.js && xdg-open ./coverage/index.html >/dev/null 2>&1 & open ./coverage/index.html

author: Mehran Khajavi<sinoohe.mkh@gmail.com>
